name: Friday night funkin' optimized for chromebooks
name_original: Friday night funkin' optimized for chromebooks
description:
the source code is part of Phykro, I only do this to add HD sprites and be optimized for old/weak PCs or Chromebooks, I wont regularly be updating the game since im new in coding and i wont be having much time, by the way, please give credit for Phykro for the source code and not me, thank you. 

changelog:

0.1.2 this time, I had to remove the numbers (the ones that show for a small second on the girlfriend sprite) I removed them since i wanted to reduce loading times and bring some small performance boost (aka: a small update)
